Title: Relates to the membership and duties of the board of trustees and the oversight of the executive director of the Brooklyn Public Library
Summary: Relates to the membership and duties of the board of trustees and the oversight of the executive director of the Brooklyn Public Library.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 606 of the laws of 1902 relating to the incorporation of the Brooklyn public library and limiting and defining the powers thereof, in relation to membership and duties of the board of trustees and oversight of certain executive personnel
